headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Podium: The Pegassi Infernus Classic
content: Donâ€™t forget to visit the spacious lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort to give the Lucky Wheel a spin and walk away with GTA$, RP, clothing, accessories, snacks, and myriad mystery prizes. This week on the podium is none other than the Pegassi Infernus Classic, a conjuring of a bygone era: sideburns, Italo disco, suffocating cologne.
